mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (boardno, accountno, managerno, crudcateno, btitle, bcontent, bdate, bpasswd, btag, bphoto, bphotosaved, bthumb, bsize) VALUES (board_seq.nextval, #{accountno}, #{managerno}, #{crudcateno}, #{btitle}, #{bcontent}, sysdate, #{bpasswd}, #{btag}, #{bphoto}, #{bphotosaved}, #{bthumb}, #{bsize})
